instructions.step: 1. Gradually blend the flour in a medium-sized saucepan with 500ml water, until smooth. 2. Add all the remaining ingredients and mix well. 3. Bring to the boil over a high heat, stirring throughout, then reduce the heat to medium and stir continuously for 2 minutes, until thickened.
